njols-hud.config.title: Njol's HUD Configuration
njols-hud.config.position.offsetXRelativ:
Horizontal position relative to the screen (0 = left, 1 = right)
Any value works, e.g. 0.1 = 10% of the screen width from the left edge.
njols-hud.config.position.offsetYRelativ:
Vertical position relative to the screen (0 = top, 1 = bottom)
Any value works, e.g. 0.1 = 10% of the screen height from the top edge.
njols-hud.config.position.offsetXAbsolut:
Absolute horizontal position offset.
This is added after the relative position has been calculated.
Negative values shift to the left, positive values shift to the right.
njols-hud.config.position.offsetYAbsolut:
Absolute vertical position offset.
This is added after the relative position has been calculated.
Negative values shift upwards, positive values shift downwards.
njols-hud.config.position.alignX.tooltip:
Horizontal alignment.
0: left-aligned, 0.5: centered, 1: right-aligned.
Any value between 0 and 1 works.
njols-hud.config.position.alignY.tooltip:
Vertical alignment.
0: top-aligned, 0.5: centered, 1: bottom-aligned.
Any value between 0 and 1 works.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_info:
HUD elements can be rearranged by pressing the 'Edit HUD' button to edit the HUD (assign this key in the Minecraft settings).
Hold shift while dragging to move horizontally or vertically only.
Hold alt to disable snapping.
Elements can also be rearranged when the chat is open as long as ctrl is held down.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_enabled.tool:
Global switch to turn all custom HUD elements on or off.
When enabled, the options below are used.
When disabled, the vanilla HUD is shown.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_statusBarsEn:
Replace status bars (health, hunger, air) with custom bars.
Also removes the armor bar without replacement.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_regeneration:
Speed of the regeneration effect, in pixels per second per level.
Set to 0 to disable the animation.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_healthText.t: Whether to display health as a number as well.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_healthTextOf:
Vertical offset of the numerical health display.
Negative values move upwards, positive values downwards.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_absorptionMa: Maximum number of extra absorption bars.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_absorptionBa:
Offset of absorption bars after the first.
Set this to a value that fits to the textures used.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_absorptionSt:
Start of absorption.
Start of health bar: Absorption starts at the beginning of the health bar, overlaid over health.
After current health: Absorption starts where current health ends.
Start in new bar: Absorption always starts in a new bar regardless of current health.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_healthMirror: When enabled, the health bar is mirrored so it fills up from the right.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_hungerMirror: When enabled, the hunger bar is mirrored so it fills up from the right.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_breathMirror: When enabled, the breath bar is mirrored so it fills up from the right.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_hideBreathWi: Hide breath bar with water breathing
When enabled, the breath bar is hidden while you have water breathing, even underwater, as long as it is full.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_mountHealthE: Replace mount health bar with a custom bar.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_mountHealthT: Whether to display the mount's health as a number as well.

Vertical offset of the numerical mount health display.
Negative values move upwards, positive values downwards.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_mountHealthM: When enabled, the mount health bar is mirrored so it fills up from the right.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_moveOverlayM:
When enabled, the overlay/action bar message text can be moved around.
Disable this if there's conflicts with other mods.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_moveHeldItem: Allow moving the held item tooltip

When enabled, the held item text can be moved around.
Disable this if there's conflicts with other mods.
njols-hud.config.option.hud_positionsInf: HUD element position values for manual adjustments
